    • Method Detail

      • bestBlock

        public ConsensusStatus.ConsensusStatusBuilder bestBlock(Hash bestBlock)
        Hash of the current best block. The best block is a protocol defined block that the node must use a parent block to build the chain on. Note that this is subjective, in the sense that it is only the best block among the blocks the node knows about.
        Returns:
        this.

      • genesisBlock

        public ConsensusStatus.ConsensusStatusBuilder genesisBlock(Hash genesisBlock)
        Hash of the genesis block.
        Returns:
        this.

      • genesisTime

        public ConsensusStatus.ConsensusStatusBuilder genesisTime(Timestamp genesisTime)
        Time of the genesis block.
        Returns:
        this.

      • slotDuration

        public ConsensusStatus.ConsensusStatusBuilder slotDuration(Duration slotDuration)
        Duration of a slot if available. Slots exist for protocol versions 1-5. From protocol version 6 and onwards the consensus protocol uses the concept of rounds.
        Returns:
        this.

      • epochDuration

        public ConsensusStatus.ConsensusStatusBuilder epochDuration(Duration epochDuration)
        Duration of an epoch.
        Returns:
        this.

      • blockReceiveLatencyEMA

        public ConsensusStatus.ConsensusStatusBuilder blockReceiveLatencyEMA(double blockReceiveLatencyEMA)
        Exponential moving average of block receive latency (in seconds), i.e. the time between a block's nominal time, and the time at which is received.
        Returns:
        this.

        Returns:

      • blocksVerifiedCount

        public ConsensusStatus.ConsensusStatusBuilder blocksVerifiedCount(int blocksVerifiedCount)
        Number of blocks that arrived, i.e., were added to the tree. Note that in some cases this can be more than ConsensusStatus.blocksReceivedCount since blocks that the node itself produces count towards this, but are not received.
        Returns:
        this.

      • blockLastArrivedTime

        public ConsensusStatus.ConsensusStatusBuilder blockLastArrivedTime(Timestamp blockLastArrivedTime)
        The time (local time of the node) that a block last arrived, i.e., was verified and added to the node's tree.
        Returns:
        this.

        The exponential moving average of the time between a block's nominal time, and the time at which it is verified.

      • blockArriveLatencyEMSD

        public ConsensusStatus.ConsensusStatusBuilder blockArriveLatencyEMSD(double blockArriveLatencyEMSD)
        Exponential moving average standard deviation of block receive latency (in seconds), i.e. the time between a block's nominal time, and the time at which is received.
        Returns:

      • blockArrivePeriodEMSD

        public ConsensusStatus.ConsensusStatusBuilder blockArrivePeriodEMSD(double blockArrivePeriodEMSD)
        Exponential moving average standard deviation of the time between finalizations. Will be `None` if there are no finalizations yet since the node start.
        Returns:
        this.

        public ConsensusStatus.ConsensusStatusBuilder transactionsPerBlockEMA(double transactionsPerBlockEMA)
        Exponential moving average of the number of transactions per block.

        The number of completed finalizations.
        Returns:

      • lastFinalizedTime

        public ConsensusStatus.ConsensusStatusBuilder lastFinalizedTime(Timestamp lastFinalizedTime)
        Time at which a block last became finalized. Note that this is the local time of the node at the time the block was finalized.
        Returns:
        this.

      • finalizationPeriodEMA

        public ConsensusStatus.ConsensusStatusBuilder finalizationPeriodEMA(double finalizationPeriodEMA)
        Exponential moving average of the time between finalizations. Will be `0` if there are no finalizations yet since the node start.
        Returns:
        this.

      • finalizationPeriodEMSD

        public ConsensusStatus.ConsensusStatusBuilder finalizationPeriodEMSD(double finalizationPeriodEMSD)
        Exponential moving average standard deviation of the time between finalizations. Will be `0` if there are no finalizations yet since the node start.
        Returns:
        this.

      • protocolVersion

        public ConsensusStatus.ConsensusStatusBuilder protocolVersion(ProtocolVersion protocolVersion)
        The current active protocol version.
        Returns:
        this.

      • genesisIndex

        public ConsensusStatus.ConsensusStatusBuilder genesisIndex(int genesisIndex)
        The number of chain restarts via a protocol update. An effected protocol update instruction might not change the protocol version specified in the previous field, but it always increments the genesis index.
        Returns:
        this.

      • currentEraGenesisBlock

        public ConsensusStatus.ConsensusStatusBuilder currentEraGenesisBlock(Hash currentEraGenesisBlock)
        Block hash of the genesis block of current era, i.e., since the last protocol update. Initially this is equal to ConsensusStatus.genesisBlock.
        Returns:
        this.

      • currentEraGenesisTime

        public ConsensusStatus.ConsensusStatusBuilder currentEraGenesisTime(Timestamp currentEraGenesisTime)
        Time when the current era started.
        Returns:
        this.

      • currentTimeoutDuration

        public ConsensusStatus.ConsensusStatusBuilder currentTimeoutDuration(Duration currentTimeoutDuration)
        The current duration to wait before a round times out. Note that this is only present from protocol version 6.
        Returns:
        this.

      • currentRound

        public ConsensusStatus.ConsensusStatusBuilder currentRound(Round currentRound)
        The current round from the perspective of the node queried.
        Returns:
        this.

      • currentEpoch

        public ConsensusStatus.ConsensusStatusBuilder currentEpoch(Epoch currentEpoch)
        The current epoch from the perspective of the node queried. This is only available from protocol version 6 and onwards.
        Returns:
        this.

      • triggerBlockTime

        public ConsensusStatus.ConsensusStatusBuilder triggerBlockTime(Timestamp triggerBlockTime)
        The nominal time of the trigger block. Whenever the trigger block is finalized then the consensus protocol will progress to a new Epoch.
        Returns:
        this.
